model.title: Web4TSComponent Must Enforce Location-Resilient CLI Standard
model.description: The Web4TSComponent must provide tools to generate, validate, and enforce the location-resilient CLI standard across all Web4 components to ensure semantic location invariance.
acceptance_criteria: validateLocationResilientCLI() verifies compliance with Web4 standard
auditComponentCompliance() checks existing components for compliance
All generated CLIs work from any directory within project
CLI scripts include project root detection, auto-build, and context preservation
Standard documentation is complete and accessible
implementation_notes: Follows Web4 Empty Constructor Principle - component initialized empty
Implements Scenario-First Development - component state is hibernatable
Uses IOR Architecture - references components by version paths
Applies Semantic Invariants - location becomes irrelevant
Embodies Occam's Razor - single pattern solves all location issues
dependencies: Node.js and npm for building components
test_scenarios: Generate CLI script and verify it works from workspace root
Generate CLI script and verify it works from nested directories
Validate non-compliant CLI scripts and verify issues are reported
Scaffold new component and verify all Web4 standards are applied
